00003 ns::import('hygia.libs.validator.Validator');
00004 ns::import('hygia.libs.exception.ValidatorNotFoundException');
00005 ns::import('hygia.libs.exception.ValidatorException');
00006 ns::import('hygia.libs.io.Response');
00007 
00014 class ValidatorXsd extends Validator implements IValidator {
00015 
00016     private $sValidatorName;
00017     private $aValidationErrors;
00018 
00023     public function __construct($sValidatorName) {
00024         $this->sValidatorName = $sValidatorName;
00025         $this->aValidationErrors = array();
00026     }
00027 
00035     public function run(Response $oResponse) {
00036 
00037         if (!$oResponse instanceof Response) {
00038             throw new ValidatorException('Response is not of type Response');
00039         }
00040 
00041         // invalid if no validator defined
00042         if (empty($this->sValidatorName)) {
00043             return false;
00044         }
00045 
00046         $sXsdPath = $this->getPath() . '/xsd/';
00047         $sFilename = $sXsdPath . $this->sValidatorName;
00048         if (!is_readable($sFilename)) {
00049             throw new ValidatorNotFoundException('File does not exist or is not readable: ' . $sFilename);
00050         }
00051         $sValidator = file_get_contents($sFilename);
00052 
00053         // load cleaned-up body (we expect xml, but if content-length body is missing, there might be mess)
00054         $oXSchema = new DOMDocument;
00055         $oXSchema->preserveWhiteSpace = false;
00056         @$oXSchema->loadXML($oResponse->getBody());
00057 
00058         // set path to xsd location
00059         $sCurPath = getcwd();
00060         chdir($sXsdPath);
00061 
00062         // set up error handling
00063         set_error_handler(array(&$this, 'staticError'));
00064         $vOld = ini_set('html_errors', false);
00065 
00066         // validate
00067         $bValid = $oXSchema->schemaValidateSource($sValidator);
00068 
00069         // restore error handling
00070         ini_set('html_errors', $vOld);
00071         restore_error_handler();
00072 
00073         // save errors
00074         $this->aValidationErrors = $this->staticError(null, null, null, null, null, true);
00075 
00076         // restore path
00077         chdir($sCurPath);
00078         return $bValid;
00079     }
00080 
00085     public function staticError($iErrNo, $sErrStr, $sErrFile, $iErrLine, $sErrContext, $bRet = false) {
00086         static $aErrors = array();
00087         if ($bRet) {
00088             return $aErrors;
00089         }
00090         $aErrors[] = str_replace('DOMDocument::schemaValidateSource(): ', '', $sErrStr);
00091     }
00092 
00098     public function getValidationErrors() {
00099         return $this->aValidationErrors;
00100     }
00101 
00102 }
